title: Interior View of the Academy of Music as Seen from Dress Circle.
description: Vertical rectangle.  Exhibition tables in the parquet, and what appears to be a fashion show on the stage.  Below: "Brooklyn Sanitary Fair, 1864 / Interior View of the Academy of Music, as Seen from the Dress Circle".  (Plate from 'History of the Brooklyn and Long Island Fair, February 22, 1864, p. 32.)
name: Print
